title: Microsoft musical instruments (MAC)
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Music - Instruction and study
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
Music & Performing Arts/Music - Instruction and study
description: You're about to enter one of the largest music studios in the world, filled with instruments from every corner of the earth - and you can play any one you want. Just click the mouse to learn how an instrument works, hear music examples, or listen to musical styles from around the globe. It is so simple a child can use it immediately, yet captivating enough that an adult will want to play for hours. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Any Macintosh computer with a compatible colour monitor; system 6.0.7 or later; 4 Mb of RAM; at least 1 Mb of available hard disk space; CD-ROM drive.
